explains: v. 彻底改造，重新创造；以新形象示人（reinvent oneself）

sentences.en: To be successful, you have to reinvent something, or a process, or have a point of differentiation.
sentences.cn: 要想成功，你要彻底改造一些东西，或一个过程，或者就要有一个不同的点。

sentences.en: They have tried to reinvent their retail stores.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在尝试改造他们的零售店。

sentences.en: He was determined to reinvent himself as a poet and writer.
sentences.cn: 他下决心把自己重塑成一个诗人兼作家。
